detail_desc: Short, fitted dress in slightly stretchy fabric with a deep V-neck at the front, a V-neck at the back and a zip down the front. Unlined.

Sleeveless playsuit in a patterned viscose weave with elastication around the neckline and decorative ties at the front. Concealed elastication at the waist, side pockets and overlocked, scalloped hems.

Short-sleeved shirt in a cotton weave with a turn-down collar and classic front. Yoke at the back, a chest pocket, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Calf-length culottes in a crêpe weave. High waist with covered elastication, pockets in the side seams and wide, straight legs.

V-neck playsuit in a crinkled weave with a wrapover front and concealed press-stud at the neckline. Opening and concealed button at the back of the neck, an elasticated seam at the waist and short, wide legs.
Jumper in a soft knit with a turtle neck and long raglan sleeves.
High-waisted jeans in washed superstretch denim with a zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and super-skinny legs.
Trousers in a soft, fine-knit wool and recycled cashmere blend. High waist with covered elastication and tapered legs with ribbing at the hems.
Jersey cycling shorts with an elasticated waist.
T-shirt in premium cotton jersey.
Sandals in imitation leather with square toes, narrow straps and covered heels. Imitation leather linings and insoles.

Shorts in grained imitation leather with a high waist, belt with metal D-rings and pleats at the front. Zip fly with a concealed button and hook-and-eye fastening, diagonal side pockets and fake back pockets. Lined.
Short, boxy-style jacket in washed denim with a collar, buttons down the front, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Flap chest pockets with a button and side pockets.
Scarf in a soft weave with fringes on the short sides. The polyester content of the scarf is recycled.
Patterned swimsuit in UV-protective material with a stand-up collar, long sleeves, short legs and a zip down the front with a chin guard. UPF 50.
Thong briefs in microfibre and mesh with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and string back.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Wide-fitting top with short dolman sleeves and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Shorts with an elasticated waist.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft, fine, fluffy knit with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved top in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a frill-trimmed yoke at the front and a small opening and button at the back of the neck.
Slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility. Adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
Short top in ribbed jersey with narrow shoulder straps and an overlocked edge at the hem.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a round neckline and print motif on the front.
Tailored shorts in woven fabric with a high waist, decorative metal buttons at the front, a concealed zip in one side and fake welt pockets at the back.
Fitted lace body with a deep V-neck, long sleeves and a seam at the hips, below which is a jersey section with press-studs at the crotch. Lined at the front.
Short skirt in washed sweatshirt fabric with raw edges and concealed elastication at the waist. Asymmetric hem with eyelets and metal rings, one with a grosgrain band. Unlined.
Fitted, stretch, turtleneck top with long sleeves and overlocked edges at the collar, cuffs and hem.
Oversized top in sweatshirt fabric with a zipped slit in each side. Small, ribbed stand-up collar, dropped shoulders, long sleeves, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Wide, high-waisted, calf-length trousers in sturdy jersey with concealed elastication at the waist and straight legs.

Short parka in a sturdy cotton weave with an integral hood and high stand-up collar with a zip and drawstring. Zip and wind flap down the front, concealed elastication at the waist and flap chest and front pockets with a concealed press-stud. Loose yoke at the back and a concealed press-stud at the cuffs. Unlined.
Lined joggers in soft, stretch denim. Casual style in a relaxed fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated, drawstring waist, diagonal side pockets and a back pocket. Lined in soft cotton jersey.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a hood, zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short, fitted dress in a softly draping, patterned viscose weave with narrow shoulder straps and a V-neck front and back.
Shirt in washed cotton denim with a grandad collar, press-studs down the front and yoke with a pleat at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.
Scarf in a soft weave with fringes on the short sides.
Joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
T-shirt in jersey with a motif.

Warm-lined boots in waterproof functional fabric with imitation leather details, an elastic drawstring at the top of the shaft and reflective details. Fabric linings and insoles and patterned soles. The boots have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Shorts in printed, lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a back pocket. Sewn-in turn-ups at the hems with the reverse side showing.
Long-sleeved shirt in cotton flannel with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Open chest pocket, buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.
Slim-fit, high-waisted jeans in washed, stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
Sleeveless, knee-length dress in a Tencel™ lyocell and cotton weave with an opening and buttons at the back of the neck. Straight cut at the top and a flared skirt with gathers at the sides.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed cotton jersey with a round neckline and ribbed cuffs.
Long cardigan in a soft knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders and patch front pockets. No buttons. The polyester content of the cardigan is recycled.
Small suede bag with a narrow, adjustable shoulder strap, zip at the top and an inner compartment. Lined. Size approx. 5.5x17x24.5 cm.
3/4-length leggings in soft, organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
V-neck jumper knitted in a blend of wool and soft, recycled cashmere. Relaxed fit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves, ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem, and slits in the sides.
Fitted polo-neck top in ribbed jersey with long sleeves.
Cardigan in a soft knit containing some wool with a shawl collar, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and side pockets.
Ankle-length dress in a crinkled weave with a flounced trim at the top. Narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back, a seam at the waist and flared skirt. Lined.
Ankle boots with lacing at the front and fabric linings and insoles. Platform front 2.5 cm, heel 10 cm.
Vest top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif, top layer in mesh at the front and striped ribbing around the neckline and armholes.
Short, sleeveless dress in an airy viscose weave with a V-neck and smocked seam under the bust. Gathered yoke at the back and smocking over the shoulders. Unlined.

Padded outdoor trousers with an elasticated waist, slightly higher cut at the back, zip fly and hook and loop fastening. Reflective detail on the back of one leg, elasticated hems and an elastic strap under the feet. Elastic braces with a hook and loop fastening. Fleece lining.

Pyjamas with a strappy top and shorts in supersoft, patterned viscose jersey. V-neck top with an elasticated lace trim around the neckline and below the bust, and adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps. Lined at the top. Short shorts with an elasticated waist, wide legs and elasticated lace side stripes.

Shimmering metallic backpack in imitation leather with appliqués. Handle and a zip at the top, adjustable shoulder straps and an outer compartment with a zip that has a soft pompom on its tab. Taffeta lining made from recycled polyester. Depth 13 cm. Width 22 cm. Height 28 cm.
Jacket in soft pile with a collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, patch front pockets and covered elastication at the cuffs. Jersey lining.
Slim-fit chinos in cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, diagonal side pockets and a fake back pocket.
Metal watch with an adjustable strap in imitation leather with a metal buckle. Width of strap 2 cm, total length 23 cm. Diameter of watch 4 cm.
Briefs in a silk blend with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and full coverage at the back.
Sleeveless blouse in a soft viscose weave with a narrow collar, buttons down the front and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Velour hairband with a knot detail at the front and elastication at the back.

Joggers in stretch cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, a fake back pocket and flap leg pockets with a hook and loop fastening. Tapered legs with decorative seams and elasticated hems.
Sleeveless dress in printed cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Straw hat with a fabric band. Lined. Width of brim 2.5 cm.
Large hair elastics in ribbed jersey without metal clips.
Blouse in a soft weave with a narrow collar, concealed buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.
Leggings in soft, printed jersey with an elasticated waist.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Denim shirt with slightly wider peak lapels and press-studs down the front. Flap chest pockets with a press-stud, press-studs at the cuffs and a straight-cut hem.
Wide, straight-cut blouse in a crêpe weave with a collar, buttons down the front and long, slightly wider sleeves with smocking and a small flounce at the cuffs.
Cardigan in soft, organic cotton jersey with a hood, chest pocket and press-studs down the front.

Long, straight-cut, double-breasted coat in felted fabric made from recycled wool and recycled polyester. Wide notch lapels, dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves that can be tightened with a tab and covered buckle at the cuffs. Diagonal welt front pockets and a single back vent. Lined in woven fabric made from recycled polyester.
Short, wide T-shirt in printed jersey.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a contrasting colour section at the front. Jersey-lined, drawstring hood, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Blouse in woven fabric with a deep V-neck and wrapover front with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener. Gathers at the shoulders, long puff sleeves and wide cuffs with covered buttons. Seam at the waist with narrow elastication and a gently flared peplum.

Short, padded jacket with a jersey-lined hood and stand-up collar with a drawstring. Zip down the front, flap side pockets with a press-stud, one inner pocket, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Quilted lining.
T-shirts in soft jersey. The cotton content of the T-shirts is organic.
Oversized T-shirt in shimmering mesh containing glittery threads. Dropped shoulders and a straight-cut hem. Unlined.

Pyjamas in soft, printed organic cotton jersey. Top with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y) and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.

Fully lined bikini top with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Narrow cut with cut-out sections at the sides, a mesh racer back with a zip that has a long tab, and covered elastication at the hem.
